metadata.title: JAMSTEC  Global Chemical Weather Forecasting System Forecasting Air Pollution on a Global Scale
metadata.description: To compare the model results with aircraft and/or ground-based observations and to evaluate the inter-continental transport of chemical species.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To compare the model results with aircraft and/or ground-based observations and to evaluate the inter-continental transport of chemical species.
